txt.en: The northern settlement of Limlók needs its defences fortified, supplies replenished, and surrounding lands made safe.
Yrsa Spearwife, Thyra, Sighild, and Trygvar can all be found in Limlók.\n\nYou should assist each of them with their tasks.
Runerik Knotbeard can be found in Limlók.\n\nYou should talk to Runerik Knotbeard.

'Yrsa has informed me that we do not need your help to keep Limlók safe. I am inclined to disagree. Oh, how I miss the years before the Orcs and Wargs came. In those days we could leave Limlók vacant all day while we wandered about the wilds. I would prefer a return to that peace we knew before my time's end.\n\n'Seek out my kin in Limlók and assist them. They will be reluctant, but I have put you to work and my word is the rule here. Report back to me when you have finished your tasks.'
Talk to Runerik Knotbeard in Limlók
'Hmm, perhaps you are useful after all. Vaskorn has informed me of your deeds in the Thornholt and now I might have to start trusting you. Ha!'
'Yrsa has informed me that we do not need your help to keep Limlók safe.'
'Hmm, perhaps you are useful after all?'
